tweet: I went to the border last weekend to look at how kids were handled. Border Patrol has diverted between 40-60% of its manpower away from the primary security mission to provide humanitarian care and help process the increasing number of family units. This is part of the evolving mission of @CBP as we deal with the border crisis. pic.twitter.com/9jdsMMIPAE

Rising apprehension numbers have put @CBP facilities in the RGV sector and across the border far above capacity. Temporary holding facilities have been stood up over the last few months to help deal with the surge. Here's a look from the Donna facility in McAllen, TX. pic.twitter.com/IY0TsYLmmY

We're here with a bipartisan delegation of House Homeland Security Committee members. Chief Patrol Agent Rodolfo Karisch provided our group with an operational overview in the RGV Sector. pic.twitter.com/hPA7GtdF87

I'm in McAllen, TX today, spending time with some of the law enforcement professionals tasked with securing our border. @CBP officers are providing extensive briefings on border infrastructure and overall status. More to follow. pic.twitter.com/3yv4F0A26V
